snippet: Thanks to the efforts of the Rockies’ grounds crew and others including a costumed mascot, the Mets and Rockies were able to play, free of snow if not close-to-freezing temperatures.
abstract: Colorado Rockies beat New York Mets, 8-4, in first game of doubleheader; thanks to efforts of Rockies grounds crew and others, teams were able to play after overnight snowstorm dumped about a foot of snow.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to the efforts of the Rockies’ grounds crew and others including a costumed mascot, the Mets and Rockies were able to play, free of snow if not close-to-freezing temperatures.

headline.seo: Before Mets-Rockies, Everybody Grabs a Snow Shovel
headline.main: Before Players Grab a Bat, Everybody Grabs a Shovel
headline.print_headline: Before Players Grab a Bat, Everybody Grabs a Shovel
